channel.title: Matt Haughey / @mathowie
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @mathowie. Generated by nitter.42l.fr

item.title: R to @ashadornfest: Yeah most friends I’ve talked to they usually took a mask off for food or water etc.
item.dc:creator: @mathowie
item.description: Yeah most friends I’ve talked to they usually took a mask off for food or water etc.

item.title: R to @gjcharlet: GJ please update my will, I want the frozen lawn dart treatment now too
item.dc:creator: @mathowie
item.description: GJ please update my will, I want the frozen lawn dart treatment now too

item.title: R to @gjcharlet: I recently learned a used ambulance usually only has like 5,000 miles on it after 10 years since they barely get driven, and I imagine it would make for a pretty damn roomy hearse too, right?
item.dc:creator: @mathowie
item.description: I recently learned a used ambulance usually only has like 5,000 miles on it after 10 years since they barely get driven, and I imagine it would make for a pretty damn roomy hearse too, right?

item.title: R to @thefinaldownco: I followed a constitutional law podcast about TFG but it was too depressing to listen to all the laws he broke without any consequences
item.dc:creator: @mathowie
item.description: I followed a constitutional law podcast about TFG but it was too depressing to listen to all the laws he broke without any consequences

item.title:
R to @mathowie: Instagram, you already know how old I am.
A guess about what’s happening: the story had “trigger warning” at the top of it (near my friend’s username so I cut it out), so maybe Instagram auto-blocks anything with that phrase but that’s not how trigger warnings normally work?
item.dc:creator: @mathowie
item.description:
Instagram, you already know how old I am.

A guess about what’s happening: the story had “trigger warning” at the top of it (near my friend’s username so I cut it out), so maybe Instagram auto-blocks anything with that phrase but that’s not how trigger warnings normally work?

item.title: R to @alirayl: I’ve never seen a blurred Instagram story before, I thought it’d be something racy or shocking and not… a tweet about medical reality now
item.dc:creator: @mathowie
item.description: I’ve never seen a blurred Instagram story before, I thought it’d be something racy or shocking and not… a tweet about medical reality now

item.title: hey Instagram why is this story blurred out and requires a tap to verify age just to read a tweet screenshot about an ectopic pregnancy almost killing a patient? It’s reality for anyone that gets pregnant now, not just those 18+
item.dc:creator: @mathowie
item.description: hey Instagram why is this story blurred out and requires a tap to verify age just to read a tweet screenshot about an ectopic pregnancy almost killing a patient? It’s reality for anyone that gets pregnant now, not just those 18+

item.title: R to @gdholtby: Every dinosaur in the show was named after an oil company!

item.title: Dang, every person I know that has flown in the past month was Covid positive immediately afterwards. Every single one.
item.dc:creator: @mathowie
item.description: Dang, every person I know that has flown in the past month was Covid positive immediately afterwards. Every single one.

item.title: witness tampering, assaulting an officer, and clearly leading an attempted coup sure seem like real laws that were really broken, but I have very little confidence anyone will charge the former president with anything. I would love to eat crow on this one.
item.dc:creator: @mathowie
item.description: witness tampering, assaulting an officer, and clearly leading an attempted coup sure seem like real laws that were really broken, but I have very little confidence anyone will charge the former president with anything. I would love to eat crow on this one.

item.title: R to @mathowie: overturning Roe, allowing prayer in public school, and dismantling the EPA sure seems like a bunch of activist judges up to no good
item.dc:creator: @mathowie
item.description: overturning Roe, allowing prayer in public school, and dismantling the EPA sure seems like a bunch of activist judges up to no good

item.title: R to @hondanhon: I had one ten years ago, and it was pretty much nothing. I was back on a bike two days later.
